title: Mad Mike's Summer Bash
description: Epic motorsport event featuring drift exhibitions, car displays, and automotive entertainment. Red Bull sponsored event with professional drivers and amazing builds on display.

daily_schedule.description: Drift exhibitions, car displays, and automotive entertainment

title: Christchurch Drift Day
description: Track day at Ruapuna Park for all skill levels. Professional instructors available. Helmet and safety gear required. Limited spots available.

daily_schedule.description: Full day track sessions with professional instruction

title: Euro Car Show Wellington
description: Celebrating European automotive excellence. BMW, Audi, VW, Mercedes and more. Trophies for best in class. Food and coffee available.

daily_schedule.description: European car displays, judging, and awards ceremony

title: NZ Car Community Mega Meet
description: Massive car gathering featuring hundreds of builds from across New Zealand. All makes and models welcome - JDM, Euro, Muscle, and everything in between. Food, music, and prizes.

daily_schedule.description: All-day car displays, music, food, and prizes

title: Classic Car & Coffee Hamilton
description: Monthly gathering for classic car enthusiasts. Coffee, pastries, and automotive stories. Family-friendly event in central Hamilton.

daily_schedule.description: Morning coffee meet with classic car displays

title: Tauranga Cruise Night
description: Sunset cruise around Tauranga followed by fish and chips at the beach. All cars welcome for this relaxed evening drive.

daily_schedule.description: Evening cruise and dinner at the beach

title: American Muscle Meetup
description: V8 thunder in Dunedin! Mustangs, Camaros, Chargers and more. Rev competition and burnout contest (in designated area only).

daily_schedule.description: Muscle car displays, rev competition, and burnout contest

title: Subaru Club Track Day
description: Private track day for Subaru owners at Hampton Downs. All models welcome from WRX to Forester. Professional timing and coaching available.

daily_schedule.description: Full day track sessions with professional timing and coaching

title: Rotary Revolution
description: Celebrating the Wankel engine! RX-7s, RX-8s, and other rotary-powered machines. Three-day festival with displays, competitions, and awards.

daily_schedule.description: Engine bay displays and initial judging
